disease: Malignant neoplasm of overlapping sites of heart, mediastinum and pleura

symptoms.name: General unwellness
symptoms.pattern: Can range from mild weakness to severe illness depending on cancer progression

symptoms.name: Weakness
symptoms.pattern: Can range from mild to severe depending on cancer progression

symptoms.name: Organ compression symptoms
symptoms.pattern: Depends on the size of the tumor and the organs compressed

required: Evidence of malignant neoplasm involving at least two of the following sites: heart, mediastinum, pleura
